coaches.description: Hi, I'm Emily! I've been teaching fullstack development for startups and tech bootcamps.
Backend specialist with a passion for clean code and optimized architectures.
Frontend developer focused on building pixel-perfect responsive websites.
Enthusiastic mentor with a background in scalable backend solutions and DevOps.
Creative frontend engineer who loves turning ideas into beautiful, functional websites.
Passionate about both frontend and backend, let's make your coding journey smooth and fun!
I've mentored hundreds of students to land their first job as a fullstack developer.
Backend-focused mentor who loves working with databases, APIs, and server-side magic.
Senior fullstack engineer ready to guide you from beginner to pro developer!
